mapper.select: SELECT URL, METHOD, REQ_USER, REQ_IP, id, del_yn, create_id, TO_CHAR(create_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS create_dt, update_id, TO_CHAR(update_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS update_dt FROM ZTHH_USERREQUESTHISTORY where del_yn='N' ORDER BY update_dt, create_dt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZTHH_USERREQUESTHISTORY (URL, METHOD, REQ_USER, REQ_IP, REQ_DATA, RES_DATA, id, del_yn, create_id, create_dt, update_id, update_dt) VALUES (#{url}, #{method}, #{reqUser}, #{reqIp}, #{reqData}, #{resData}, #{id}, 'N', #{createId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{updateId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: UPDATE ZTHH_USERREQUESTHISTORY SET del_yn = 'Y', update_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(create_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS request_date, COUNT(*) AS request_count FROM ZTHH_USERREQUESTHISTORY WHERE create_dt >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 6 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(create_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(create_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD')
SELECT url AS REQUEST_URL, count(*) AS REQUEST_COUNT FROM ZTHH_USERREQUESTHISTORY group BY URL ORDER BY REQUEST_COUNT desc
